nodes.text: The Force Awakens: Rey's and Finn's Stories

The Force Awakens: Rey's and Finn's Stories is the compilation of Rey's Story and Finn's Story, both of which retell the story of Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens from their respective characters' perspectives. While both books were released in English individually in 2016, the compilation was released in Germany by Panini on October 16, 2017.
